name: MIS Adjudications and IEP by Equality Characteristics
description:
Displays a Summary of Adjudications and IEP Levels across protected characteristics of prisoners in a sinlge establishment.
NB: IEP and protected characteristic data shown as it is now, not as it was at the time of adjudication
PDD0103 v00.00.01 Last Updated 26/03/2019

dataset.name: Adjudication Details
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT DT_OFFENDER_ADJUDICATION.AGENCY_INCIDENT_ID_NK, DT_OFFENDER_ADJUDICATION.OIC_INCIDENT_ID, DT_OFFENDER_ADJUDICATION.OIC_HEARING_ID_NK, AT_ADJUDICATION_ESTAB.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK, AT_DIM_OIC_OFFENCE_CHARGE.OIC_OFFENCE_CODE, DT_OFFENDER_ADJUDICATION.REPORT_DATE, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.SURNAME, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.INITIALS, AT_FACT_INCIDENT_CHARGE_RESULT.FINDING_CODE, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, COALESCE(AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.RELIGION_DESCRIPTION, 'Not Specified') AS RELIGION_DESCRIPTION, CASE WHEN AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES.CODE = 'MERGE' THEN 'Code Missing' WHEN AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES.CODE IS NULL THEN 'Code Missing' WHEN AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES.CODE = 'W8' THEN 'White: Gypsy or Irish Traveller' WHEN AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES.CODE = 'O1' THEN 'Asian/Asian British: Chinese' ELSE AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES.DESCRIPTION END AS ETHNIC_DESCRIPTION, COALESCE(AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.IEP_BAND, '** Incentive Level Missing **') AS IEP_BAND, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.SEX_ORIENTATION_DESCRIPTION, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.NATIONALITY_DESCRIPTION, CASE WHEN BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_PERSONAL_CARE.TYPE IS NULL THEN 'N' WHEN BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_PERSONAL_CARE.TYPE = 'DISAB' AND BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_PERSONAL_CARE.STATUS = 'I' THEN 'N' WHEN BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_PERSONAL_CARE.TYPE = 'DISAB' AND BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_PERSONAL_CARE.STATUS = 'ON' AND NOT BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_PERSONAL_CARE.CODE IN ('ND', 'PRD', 'RD', 'NR') THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS DISABILITY_ACTIVE_FLAG FROM BODIMIS.FACT_INCIDENT_CHARGE_RESULT AT_FACT_INCIDENT_CHARGE_RESULT, BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_ADJUDICATION_ESTAB, BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP, BODIMIS.DIM_OIC_OFFENCE AT_DIM_OIC_OFFENCE_CHARGE, BODIMIS.DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES, (SELECT a.oic_incident_id, c.offender_booking_sk, c.agency_incident_id_nk, c.charge_seq_nk, c.oic_offence_sk, a.oic_hearing_id_nk, a.party_seq_nk, a.establishment_sk, c.report_date, a.oic_hearing_type, a.notification_charge_date_sk FROM bodimis.fact_incident_charge c LEFT OUTER JOIN bodimis.fact_offender_adjudication a ON c.agency_incident_id_nk = a.agency_incident_id_nk AND c.offender_booking_sk = a.offender_booking_sk) DT_OFFENDER_ADJUDICATION, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_PERSONAL_CARE WHERE (AT_DIM_OIC_OFFENCE_CHARGE.OIC_OFFENCE_SK = DT_OFFENDER_ADJUDICATION.OIC_OFFENCE_SK) AND (DT_OFFENDER_ADJUDICATION.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK) AND (AT_ADJUDICATION_ESTAB.ESTABLISHMENT_SK (+) = DT_OFFENDER_ADJUDICATION.ESTABLISHMENT_SK) AND (DT_OFFENDER_ADJUDICATION.AGENCY_INCIDENT_ID_NK = AT_FACT_INCIDENT_CHARGE_RESULT.AGENCY_INCIDENT_ID (+) AND DT_OFFENDER_ADJUDICATION.OIC_HEARING_ID_NK = AT_FACT_INCIDENT_CHARGE_RESULT.OIC_HEARING_ID_NK (+) AND DT_OFFENDER_ADJUDICATION.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK = AT_FACT_INCIDENT_CHARGE_RESULT.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK (+) AND DT_OFFENDER_ADJUDICATION.CHARGE_SEQ_NK = AT_FACT_INCIDENT_CHARGE_RESULT.CHARGE_SEQ (+)) AND (AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES.CODE (+) = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ETHNICITY_CODE) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_) AND CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ESTABLISHMENT_SK) AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK = BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_PERSONAL_CARE.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK (+)) AND ((AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND DT_OFFENDER_ADJUDICATION.REPORT_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE('01-04-2019 00:00:00', 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_DATE('07-04-2019 00:00:00', 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AND AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK = (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_))), dataset_ AS (SELECT AGENCY_INCIDENT_ID_NK, OIC_INCIDENT_ID, OIC_HEARING_ID_NK, ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK, OIC_OFFENCE_CODE, REPORT_DATE, SURNAME, INITIALS, FINDING_CODE, OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, RELIGION_DESCRIPTION, ETHNIC_DESCRIPTION, IEP_BAND, SEX_ORIENTATION_DESCRIPTION, NATIONALITY_DESCRIPTION, DISABILITY_ACTIVE_FLAG FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: All Prisoners
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.SURNAME, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.FIRST_NAME, COALESCE(AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.RELIGION_DESCRIPTION, 'Not Specified') AS RELIGION_DESCRIPTION, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.NATIONALITY_DESCRIPTION, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.SEX_ORIENTATION_DESCRIPTION, CASE WHEN AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES.CODE = 'MERGE' THEN 'Code Missing' WHEN AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES.CODE IS NULL THEN 'Code Missing' WHEN AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES.CODE = 'W8' THEN 'White: Gypsy or Irish Traveller' WHEN AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES.CODE = 'O1' THEN 'Asian/Asian British: Chinese' ELSE AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES.DESCRIPTION END AS ETHNIC_DESCRIPTION, CASE WHEN BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_PERSONAL_CARE.TYPE IS NULL THEN 'N' WHEN BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_PERSONAL_CARE.TYPE = 'DISAB' AND BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_PERSONAL_CARE.STATUS = 'I' THEN 'N' WHEN BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_PERSONAL_CARE.TYPE = 'DISAB' AND BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_PERSONAL_CARE.STATUS = 'ON' AND NOT BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_PERSONAL_CARE.CODE IN ('ND', 'PRD', 'RD', 'NR') THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS DISABILITY_ACTIVE_FLAG, COALESCE(AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.IEP_BAND, '** Incentive Level Missing **') AS IEP_BAND, AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP, BODIMIS.DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_PERSONAL_CARE WHERE (AT_DIM_ETHNICITY_CODES.CODE (+) = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ETHNICITY_CODE) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_) AND CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ESTABLISHMENT_SK) AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK = BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_PERSONAL_CARE.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK (+)) AND ((AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK = (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_))), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, SURNAME, FIRST_NAME, RELIGION_DESCRIPTION, NATIONALITY_DESCRIPTION, SEX_ORIENTATION_DESCRIPTION, ETHNIC_DESCRIPTION, DISABILITY_ACTIVE_FLAG, IEP_BAND, ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK, 'TBD' AS V_COUNT_BASIC_ETH, 'TBD' AS V_COUNT_ENTRY_ETH, 'TBD' AS V_COUNT_STANDARD_ETH, 'TBD' AS V_COUNT_ENHANCED_ETH, 'TBD' AS V_COUNT_BASIC_DIS, 'TBD' AS V_COUNT_ENTRY_DIS, 'TBD' AS V_COUNT_STANDARD_DIS, 'TBD' AS V_COUNT_ENHANCED_DIS FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: Activities
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.SURNAME, TRUNC(AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY.START_TIME) AS ACTIVITY_SESSION_DATE, AT_DIM_ACTIVITY_STATUS.DESCRIPTION, AT_DIM_PROGRAMME_TYPE.DESCRIPTION AS ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION FROM BODIMIS.FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY, BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_ACTIVITY_ESTABLISHMENT, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, BODIMIS.DIM_REFERENCE_CODES AT_DIM_ACTIVITY_STATUS, BODIMIS.DIM_PROGRAMME_TYPE AT_DIM_PROGRAMME_TYPE WHERE (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_) AND CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK) AND (AT_DIM_PROGRAMME_TYPE.PROGRAMME_TYPE_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY.PROGRAMME_TYPE_SK) AND (AT_DIM_ACTIVITY_STATUS.CODE_DOMAIN (+) = 'PS_PA_OC') AND (AT_DIM_ACTIVITY_STATUS.CODE (+) = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY.STATUS) AND (AT_ACTIVITY_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY.ESTABLISHMENT_SK) AND ((AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.BOOKING_STATUS = 'O') AND (AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY.ALLOCATED_FLAG = 'Y') AND ((AT_DIM_PROGRAMME_TYPE.SCHEDULE_END_DATE IS NULL OR AT_DIM_PROGRAMME_TYPE.SCHEDULE_END_DATE > TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP))) AND TRUNC(AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY.START_TIME) BETWEEN TO_DATE('01-04-2019 00:00:00', 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_DATE('07-04-2019 00:00:00', 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AND AT_ACTIVITY_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK = (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_))), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, SURNAME, ACTIVITY_SESSION_DATE, DESCRIPTION, ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION, 'TBD' AS V_COUNT_ENTRY_ACT, 'TBD' AS V_COUNT_BASIC_ACT, 'TBD' AS V_COUNT_STANDARD_ACT, 'TBD' AS V_COUNT_ENHANCED_ACT FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: Load End Date
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG.BUSINESS_DATE FROM BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG WHERE (BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG.LOAD_ID = (SELECT MAX(LOAD_ID) FROM BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG WHERE NOT LOAD_END_DATETIME IS NULL))), dataset_ AS (SELECT BUSINESS_DATE FROM dataset_base_)

field.name: $ref:V_COUNT_BASIC_DIS
field.legacySql: =Count([NOMS Number]) In ([All Prisoners].[Disability Active Flag]) Where ( [v_basic]=1)

field.name: $ref:V_COUNT_ENTRY_DIS
field.legacySql: =Count([NOMS Number]) In ([All Prisoners].[Disability Active Flag]) Where ([v_Entry]=1)

field.name: $ref:V_COUNT_STANDARD_DIS
field.legacySql: =Count([NOMS Number]) In ([All Prisoners].[Disability Active Flag]) Where ([v_Standard]=1)

field.name: $ref:V_COUNT_ENHANCED_DIS
field.legacySql: =Count([NOMS Number]) In ([All Prisoners].[Disability Active Flag]) Where ([v_Enhanced]=1)

filter.name: prefilter_
filter.query: prefilter_ AS (SELECT * FROM dataset_ WHERE HEARING_FINDING IN ('PROVED'))
